cause.description:
Hurricane Katrina devastated the Lower 9th Ward, creating a pressing need for housing.
The Center for Sustainable Engagement and Development will :
• Link residents to sustainable building resources and training opportunites • Purchase green materials in bulk for affordable resale • Engage returned/displaced neighbors in civic activities • Develop parks and community gardens
Through this project, the Lower 9th Ward will be resilient, prosperous, and energy independent.
1. Sustainability in rebuilding efforts, New Orleans
cause.mission: build a strong community in the Lower Ninth Ward, New Orleans within the context of its unique history, resources and vulnerabilities.
cause.name: Rebuilding New Orleans sustainably
